career_history.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Working on a cloud-based software for emergency response hardware for detecting hazardous environmental events.
Developing and maintaining systems in Node, socket.io, Angular/React, Python, PHP, MySQL, AWS Lambda.
Building software interfaces for device communication using React JS, Angular, Material UI, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
Utilized NextJS routing for dynamic user interfaces.
Using Github Action and Jenkins for CI/CD pipelining and automated testing with Jest.
Maintaining Python and Node based code for backend hardware communication.
Mentoring a small team of developers remotely.

career_history.title: Software Engineer III
responsibilities: Worked on the 3rd party sales platforms using ReactJS, React Native, Redux, GraphQL, Node.js.
Developed UI pages for websites and mobile applications.
Architected solutions and led project discovery and workshops.
Performed frontend and backend testing with Jest for code coverage.

career_history.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed tooling for Ownership and Management using React.js, GraphQL via Relay.js, Flow.js and PHP.
Worked on frontend using React with TypeScript/Flow.
Performed backend queries in GraphQL.
Implemented CI/CD pipeline updates and used React Hooks for state and lifecycle management.

career_history.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Using jQuery, React, JavaScript, JAVA, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, and SQL Server I helped develop several new application for the Wells Fargo Ivestor Guidence team.
Went through Investor Guidence software making it ADA compliant.

career_history.title: Software engineer III
responsibilities: Developed features for 'quickbooks.intuit.com' on the Accountant team using ReactJS and NodeJS.
Refactored old code into ReactJS components.
Supported the product by fixing bugs and security issues.
Used Jest for unit tests and esLint for code quality.

career_history.title: Senior Engineer & Developer
responsibilities: Worked with Account-Post Transaction Team on Walmart.com.
Focused on frontend and proxy layer with Hapi.js, Node.js, ReactJS, Redux, GraphQL.
Built and maintained user account and transaction history interfaces.
Implemented end-to-end automation testing with Nightwatch.js.

career_history.title: Senior Engineer & Developer
responsibilities: Developed automated end-to-end testing using CodeCeptJS.
Developed features for DNAC platform using NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, jQuery, ReactJS, and Redux.

career_history.title: Senior/Lead UI Engineer
responsibilities: Started off as a Project for Mind Slap and forked into its own company.
Placed in an upper level lead role while remaining a developer.
Ran a small team of sysops and developers to build and enhance features of the full stack.
Managed teams including DevOps, SysOps, SysAdmins, and Developers.
Conducted budget meetings, product planning meetings, and regular exec level meetings.
Acted as Lead Architect / Engineer to general Boss of Operations for Tech and Development.
Used PHP, MySQL, ReactJS, vanilla JavaScript as primary tools.
Built from the ground up using Codigniter & Symfony PHP MVC Frameworks for a SaaS application.
Managed services architecture from the server level up.
Managed Wordpress CMS based sites.
Utilized JIRA for Product Feature Storyboarding, Task management, Bug Tracking.
Organized Development and Tasks through Agile Methodologies.
Developed features on the frontend and backend.
Communicated with Sales and Executive team for development direction based on budget and ROI.

career_history.title: Lead & Senior Software Engineer Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built, enhanced, or maintained projects across several platforms for various companies and clients.
Developed and managed projects and teams using Codigniter, Zend Framework, Wordpress CMS, and other frameworks.

career_history.title: Senior Software Engineer (Full Stack)
responsibilities: Focused on the front end of the tech stack to rebrand, develop, and enhance features of a cloud-based service in the Backup and Disaster Recovery sector.
Worked with Zend Framework and ReactJS as primary technologies.
Aimed to build out web 3.0 technologies and push the limits of front end technology.
Interacted with backend technologies through the use of PHP, JavaScript, Backbone, ReactJS, jQuery, REST, JSON, AJAX.
Rebuilt the UI in React.js, Backbone.js, Bootstrap / Sass over two years.
Developed various tools and utilities to communicate with an application layer through external APIs.
